isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Orifice Tube System, Pre-March 2007 - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500, 8600 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - ACCUMULATOR

figure.caption: Figure 27. Accumulator (Shown with Splash Panel and Cowl Tray Removed)

note.para: If the accumulator is one of multiple components being installed in the system, the accumulator should be the last component installed. This reduces the amount of time that the accumulator desiccant is exposed to atmospheric moisture.
Refer to Figure 27 while performing the following Remove and Install procedures.

step1.para: Discharge the A/C system. Refer to DISCHARGING THE SYSTEM .
If necessary, remove right side splash panel. Refer to HOOD, GRILLE, and FENDERS section in GROUP 09- FRONT END SHEET METAL in the Master Service Manual.

Remove cowl drain tray/HVAC air inlet. Refer to REMOVE AND INSTALL, COWL DRAIN TRAY/HVAC AIR INLET
.
Disconnect wiring connection to thermistor (3) located on accumulator (4).
Disconnect end of suction line (7) connected to accumulator from compressor (accumulator-to-compressor line).
To allow movement of the accumulator-to-compressor line, remove or loosen the hose support clamps (1) and plastic ties used to secure the line to the cowl.
Disconnect evaporator-to-accumulator line (6) at evaporator outlet.
While supporting accumulator (4), remove two accumulator mounting bolts (5); then, remove the accumulator with the evaporator-to-accumulator line (6) attached.
Remove evaporator-to-accumulator line from accumulator.
Remove thermistor (3) from the accumulator.
Transfer thermistor from removed accumulator or install new thermistor (3) in new accumulator (4).

If the system is to be flushed or purged, perform that operation before reassembling the system. Refer to PURGING OR FLUSHING THE AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEM
.

note.para: Always lubricate O-rings on fittings with mineral-based oil during installation.

step1.para: Using a new O-ring and C-plate install evaporator-to-accumulator line (6) on accumulator. Tighten to 20,000 ±1000 N.mm (180 ±10 lbf-in).
Using a new O-ring and C-plate connect evaporator-to-accumulator line fitting to evaporator outlet. Tighten to 20,000 ±1000 N.mm (180 ±10 lbf-in).
Using a new O-ring and C-plate connect fitting on accumulator-to-compressor line (7) to accumulator (4). Tighten to 20,000 ±1000 N.mm (180 ±10 lbf-in).
Install accumulator (4) by using two accumulator mounting bolts (5) to secure the accumulator to the evaporator housing (2).
Connect wiring connection to thermistor (3) located on accumulator.
Using the hose support clamp (1) and plastic ties secure the accumulator-to-compressor line (7) to the cowl.

Install cowl drain tray/HVAC air inlet. Refer to REMOVE AND INSTALL, COWL DRAIN TRAY/HVAC AIR INLET
.
Install right side splash panel, if previously removed.
